concept.title: Thesaurus Tab (will be deleted)
concept.shortdesc: Define and comment your thesaurus entry here.

conbody.p: If your entry already appeared in the old BTS-Database use the following fields to deliver the connection between old and new entry.
Old_id: Enter the old id here.
Old_thesaurus_number: Enter the old number of the Thesaurus entry here.
Variants: Enter variants of your entry here. This may be useful for variably used terms such as "El-Bersche", "Al-Bairsheh", "Al-Bersche".
